name: JieHong Surgical Gowns

overview.title: JieHong Surgical Gowns
overview.text: JieHong Surgical Gown is a full breathable outside poly surgical gown.

specifications.value:

productDetail:
JieHong Surgical Gowns

Full breathable outside poly surgical gown, Hand towel, Wrap
AATCC 42 (impact penetration) <= 0.1g
AATCC 127 (hydrostatic pressure) >= 50cm

The product meet FDA Level 3 Surgical Gown requirement
The product is certified for EN ISO 13485 Sterile conditions, sterlised systems or procedure packs.
The product conforms to FDA ASNI PB70:2003 and is certified by 'TUV SUD'.
The product confroms to YY/T 0506: 2016. It is certified by 'Jinan center for quality supervision and inspection of medical devices, state food and drug administration', a China National Accreditation Service for Conformity Assessment (CNAS) listed testing laboratory.
The factory certified by China National Medical Products Administration (NMPA).
